channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Woostify Sites Library
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Woostify Sites Library

item.title: CVE-2023-6279|2024-08-02T08:28:20.402Z -- unknown -- woostify%20sites%20library
item.description: The Woostify Sites Library WordPress plugin before 1.4.8 does not have authorisation in an AJAX action, allowing any authenticated users, such as subscriber to update arbitrary blog options and set them to 'activated' which could lead to DoS when using a specific option name
